body_html:
@johnsrude, tfdbg also has a readline ui_type, which can be activated with something like

sess = tf_debug.LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession(sess, ui_type="readline")

Would that suite your use case? Or do you still prefer to use the curses ui_type on Windows, which AFAIK not many users are using?
body:
@johnsrude, tfdbg also has a readline ui_type, which can be activated with something like

```python
sess = tf_debug.LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession(sess, ui_type="readline")
```

Would that suite your use case? Or do you still prefer to use the curses ui_type on Windows, which AFAIK not many users are using?
